Hi! I'm Meghan

A web developer dedicated to crafting engaging, user-friendly digital experiences. I value collaboration and believe the best designs come from teamwork and open communication. I'm committed to improving my skills to solve problems and enhance user experiences.

Let's work together to build something inspiring and make a meaningful impact!

About Me

My Past

I began my professional career at Moda Health as a Group Underwriter, then Data Analyst. During my time there, I was eager to explore ways to enhance our outdated Excel tools. I learned VBA to create user-friendly interfaces, which sparked a passion for merging creativity and design with technical skills. Speaking with a colleague, I was introduced to Front-End development. These conversations solidified my direction for my undergraduate major and helped me clarify my career aspirations.

My Future

I see myself mastering web development and gaining a strong understanding of UX/UI. I envision being at a company long-term, evolving with new technologies, and embracing new challenges. Each day, I want to wake up excited about what I do.

My Present

I recently graduated with my BS in Computer Science, where I discovered my passion for web development and design. I'm dedicated to enhancing my understanding of web technologies and actively working on personal projects on GitHub. I take meticulous time on each of my projects, striving to expand my learnings to improve my current work. I love bringing ideas to life and am eager to learn from others in the field. My goal is to evolve into a career as a web developer and designer, focusing on creating intuitive user interfaces, implementing smooth transitions, and optimizing performance.
